normalized: several days later――
darkness visited again on the city center like nothing had happened.
the man i loved was gone.
such things, i felt, were absolutely nonexistant.
however, i stood on both feet, breathin in the air mixed with exhaust fumes.

name: asagi
normalized: this is…a world nonexistant of kyousuke
again, let's stop thinking about it.
i regret and mourn kyousuke's death, and i remember who kyousuke was….
let me live with that fate, let's accept it.
with the fate that is said to be in the blood of anti-demon ninja running in this body.
not so much for the good of who as killing the demons for the sake of myself, let's keep living.
i was entirely an animal, hiding my breath, clad in my ninja costume among the quiet ravines of the buildings, i stood.
once more, for the sake of living in the role of an anti-demon ninja, it was essential to put an end to this.

name: asagi
normalized: it's been awhile.
senior

name: senior
normalized: a, asagi?
wh, why are you here!?
i was meeting with the highest ranking leader of the anti-demon ninja.

name: asagi
normalized: you also say why, why should i be expected to arrange a meeting today?
even i was astonished by my tone to that extent, it was indifferent.
it should be so the senior also felt that ambiance.
no, this older person facing across from me, he isn't hiding anything from me.

name: senior
normalized: you certainly may arrange a rendezvous.
but, i still think the arranged location was not as scheduled.
that's right, the senior always communicates to a subordinate through non-intervention, like telepathy, meeting firsthand is absolutely forbidden.
engaging in an important government office, trying to manage the anti-demon ninja, he is always in constant danger, it is only natural he takes precautions.

name: asagi
normalized: yes, i feel i am a little early, but… it was because at any cost i wanted to meet with you firsthand… please forgive me
the senior, as it as, stared at me with what looked like an unrestful, dubious expression, not saying a word.

name: asagi
normalized: …senior, it is you, isn't it
the old person before my eyes, already was no longer unrestful.

name: senior
normalized: hmm…i wonder what this is about?

name: asagi
normalized: the koka, me with the ofa, asagi ikawa's lineage, and then me sinking into the experience of being an adn, you submitted kyousuke sawaki for acceptance

name: senior
normalized: why, do you think it's me?

name: asagi
normalized: kyousuke sawaki had spoken to me before, having become a parasite in the body of the head of the ofa, oboro

name: asagi
normalized: he said he had things to do at home, to say goodbye.
house sawaki's family predecessor, he needed someone to meet and look after his grandfather

name: asagi
normalized: the matter of the sawaki family, if i could check up on his grandfather particularly…

name: senior
normalized: you mean…ending up with me
i, as it is, nodded silently.

name: asagi
normalized: moreover, as for asagi ikawa knowing about being adn….
i was limited as a person

name: senior
normalized: and the position of your younger sister with me… after, your lover dying too
i silently nodded, gripping my hand gently on my katana.

name: asagi
normalized: in accordance with your intentions, kyousuke died because i withdrew from the adn.
and now, i feel i should return to the adn

name: senior
normalized: is that so….
so are you saying you're going to kill me?
are you bitter?
about your lover dying
i swung my head without any expression.

name: asagi
normalized: kyousuke died for the sake of my work….
and so, he died by my hand.
i do not resent the senior

name: senior
normalized: …put on a good face, asagi.
you, are becoming even stronger.
i almost cannot even imagine
i took out my katana, posturing up.

name: asagi
normalized: i'm punishing you for trying to be the head of the iga.
be that as it may you're a family predecessor, it is taboo that you sold an ally to an enemy, it's unacceptable…

name: senior
normalized: well, that was to dispossess a koka person from an important government office
the senior breathed a light sigh, looking to the sky.

name: asagi
normalized: but that, is the reason?

name: senior
normalized: i also have grown old.
and so i can't do things like i used to in my former days.
the ninja too don't work the way they used to…that's politics, asagi

name: asagi
normalized: and the information i got, made me fight oboro

name: senior
normalized: while you have a justifiable reason to kill me yourself, killing me would only put an enemy in power

name: asagi
normalized: …are you begging for your life?

name: senior
normalized: it was arranged by an enemy other than the adn.
asagi, are you prepared for that?
i nodded.

name: asagi
normalized: i don't care who it is i fight.
even if it's other adn, much less you
the senior was planning something, stepping back.

name: senior
normalized: it has really become ok in your eyes.
i felt composure in the senior.
i estimated this would be the time he'd make an escape.

name: asagi
normalized: however, you won't be going down by my hand

name: senior
normalized: what?
guu!
a sword manifested from the senior's shadow, piercing the old person.
the sound of going thru flesh, and then the katana being extracted, and now only gushing blood.

name: sakura
normalized: anti-demon ninja sakura.
due to a government decree, i exile you to death for violating taboo!

name: senior
normalized: indeed….
it's too late to talk about it… fufu, it was preposterous buffonery
blood trickled and fell down from the senior's mouth.

name: asagi
normalized: it's politics.
senior…
i had already obtained permission to erase the senior according to the conditions of the adn with the reinstatement of me and now sakura to the adn.
of course, concerning the behavior of the senior now, a government body wouldn't have been suitable, so i carried out the judgement.

name: senior
normalized: it wasn't easy, asagi…i begged the iga…
the senior squeezed out a voice, staring at me as he said so.

name: asagi
normalized: the matter up until now, you have my thanks
the senior's head was informed before i separated it with a flash of my blade.
and thus, we flew away, entrusting our bodies to the night sky.
two people melt into the crescent moon of the night sky.
the two anti-demon ninja restore their energy for the sake of fighting the leader of the powerful darkness.
that ahead, the way of outcasts, while knowing the scenes of carnage will continue on, the two people existing as female ninjas intend to advance upon it unwaveringly.
their fight will coninue on.
although they realize there won't be an end or a rest from that fight…
